00259         public function getArray() {
00260                 
00261                 $return = $this->fields;
00262                 foreach($this->related as $field => $related) {
00263                         if(is_array($related)) {
00264                                 $return[$field] = array();
00265                                 foreach($related as $record) {
00266                                         $return[$field][] = $record->getArray();
00267                                 }
00268                         }else $return[$field] = $related->getArray();
00269                 }
00270                 return $return;
00271                 
00272         }

00284         public function runHook($name, $required = false) {
00285                 
00286                 if(!isset(static::$$name)) throw new BadArgumentException("Invalid hook name '$name' given to " . static::getName() . "::runHook(), see documentation for valid hooks.");
00287                 if(!empty(static::$$name)) {
00288                         $return = array();
00289                         foreach(static::$$name as $method) {
00290                                 if(method_exists($this, $method)) $return[] = $this->$method();
00291                                 else throw new BadConfigurationException("Model '" . static::getName() . "' contains a bad method '$method' for hook '$name'.  Ensure the method exists.");
00292                         }
00293                         return array_reduce($return, function($a, $b) {return $a and $b;}, true);
00294                 }
00295                 if($required) throw new MVCException("No methods found for required hook '$name' in " . static::getName() . ".");
00296                 else return true;
00297                 
00298         }

00325         public function __construct($fields = array()) {
00326                 
00327                 static::__init();
00328                 $this->fields = static::p()->table->getDefaultRecord();
00329                 $this->runHook('beforeConstruct');
00330                 foreach(static::getFields() as $field) if(isset($fields[$field])) $this->fields[$field] = $fields[$field];
00331                 $this->runHook('afterConstruct');
00332                 
00333         }

00343         public function &__get($field) {
00344                 
00345                 // Avoids errors about variable references.
00346                 $null = null;
00347                 
00348                 // Return the actual primary key value if the request is for primary_key.
00349                 if($field == 'primary_key') return $this->fields[static::getPrimaryKey()];
00350                 
00351                 // Check if it's a field first.
00352                 if(isset($this->fields[$field])) return $this->fields[$field];
00353                 if(in_array($field, static::getFields())) return $null;
00354                 
00355                 // Check relations...
00356                 if(isset(static::p()->hasOne[$field]) or isset(static::p()->hasMany[Inflector::singularize($field)]) or isset(static::p()->belongsTo[$field])) {
00357                         if(isset($this->related[$field])) return $this->related[$field];
00358                         else return $null;
00359                 }else throw new InvalidFieldException($field, static::p()->name);
00360                 
00361         }
00362         
00372         public function __set($field, $value) {
00373                 
00374                 // First check if it's setting the primary_key...
00375                 if($field == 'primary_key') $this->fields[static::getPrimaryKey()] = $value;
00376                 
00377                 // Check fields first...
00378                 elseif(in_array($field, static::getFields())) $this->fields[$field] = $value;
00379                 
00380                 // Check the related models...
00381                 elseif(isset(static::p()->hasOne[$field]) or isset(static::p()->hasMany[Inflector::singularize($field)]) or isset(static::p()->belongsTo[$field])) $this->related[$field] = $value;
00382                 else throw new InvalidFieldException($field, static::p()->name);
00383                 
00384         }
00385         
00393         public function __isset($field) {
00394                 
00395                 if($field == 'primary_key') return isset($this->fields[static::getPrimaryKey()]);
00396                 return isset($this->fields[$field]) ? true : (isset($this->related[$field]) ? true : false);
00397                 
00398         }
00399         
00408         public function __unset($field) {
00409                 
00410                 if($field == 'primary_key') unset($this->fields[static::getPrimaryKey()]);
00411                 elseif(in_array($field, static::getFields())) unset($this->fields[$field]);
00412                 elseif(isset($this->related[$field])) unset($this->related[$field]);
00413                 else throw new InvalidFieldException($field, static::p()->name);
00414                 
00415         }

00423         public static function __init() {
00424                 
00425                 if(!isset(static::$states[get_called_class()])) static::$states[get_called_class()] = new \StdClass;
00426                 else return;
00427                 
00428                 // Store the model name (sans namespace) in the metadata.
00429                 static::p()->name = @end(explode('\\', static::getName()));
00430                 static::p()->tableName = static::$tableName ?: Inflector::tableize(static::p()->name);
00431                 static::p()->table = Table::instance(static::p()->tableName);
00432                 static::p()->validate = static::$validate ?: array();
00433                 
00434                 static::normalizeRelations();
00435                 
00436         }
00437         
00454         protected static function normalizeRelations() {
00455                 
00456                 static::p()->hasOne = static::$hasOne;
00457                 static::p()->hasMany = static::$hasMany;
00458                 static::p()->belongsTo = static::$belongsTo;
00459                 
00460                 $relationConfig = array('hasOne' => &static::p()->hasOne, 'hasMany' => &static::p()->hasMany, 'belongsTo' => &static::p()->belongsTo);
00461                 foreach($relationConfig as $relationType => &$relations) {
00462                         foreach($relations as $index => &$relation) {
00463                                 if(is_int($index) and is_string($relation)) {
00464                                         $alias = $model = $relation;
00465                                         $relations[$alias] = array();
00466                                         $relation =& $relations[$alias];
00467                                         unset($relations[$index]);
00468                                 }elseif(is_string($index) and is_array($relation)) $alias = $model = $index;
00469                                 else throw new BadConfigurationException("Invalid $relationType configuration in model " . static::getName() . ', see documentation for correct format.');
00470                                 
00471                                 if(isset($relation['model'])) $model = $relation['model'];
00472                                 else $relation['model'] = $model;
00473                                 
00474                                 // Deal with namespacing
00475                                 if(!class_exists($relation['model'], false)) {
00476                                         // Try prefixing the namespace of the current model.
00477                                         $namespace = str_replace(static::p()->name, '', get_called_class());
00478                                         $relation['model'] = "$namespace$model";
00479                                         
00480                                         // Run a method with that class, if it doesn't exist the user will have to sort it out.
00481                                         $relation['model']::getName();
00482                                 }
00483                                 
00484                                 $key = Inflector::underscore(static::p()->name) . '_' . static::getPrimaryKey();
00485                                 if($relationType == 'belongsTo') $key = Inflector::underscore($alias) . '_' . $relation['model']::getPrimaryKey();
00486                                 if(isset($relation['foreignKey'])) $key = $relation['foreignKey'];
00487                                 else $relation['foreignKey'] = $key;
00488                                 
00489                                 if(!isset($relation['options'])) $relation['options'] = array();
00490                                 if($relationType != 'hasMany') {
00491                                         $relation['options']['type'] = 'first';
00492                                         $relation['options']['limit'] = 1;
00493                                 }
00494                         }
00495                 }
00496                 
00497         }
00498         
00514         public static function __callStatic($name, $args) {
00515                 
00516                 $methodParts = explode('_', Inflector::underscore($name));
00517                 
00518                 $model = static::getName();
00519                 $error = function() use ($name, $model) {trigger_error("Call to undefined method " . $model . "::" . $name . "()", E_USER_ERROR);};
00520                 if(array_shift($methodParts) != 'find') $error();
00521                                 
00522                 $options = array();
00523                 switch(array_shift($methodParts)) {
00524                         case 'first':
00525                                 $options['type'] = 'first';
00526                                 break;
00527                         case 'all':
00528                                 $options['type'] = 'all';
00529                                 break;
00530                         default:
00531                                 $error();
00532                                 break;
00533                 }
00534                 if(empty($methodParts)) {
00535                         if(!isset($args[0]) or !is_array($args[0])) $args[0] = array();
00536                         return call_user_func(array(static::getName(), 'find'), array_merge($args[0], $options));
00537                 }
00538                 
00539                 if(array_shift($methodParts) != 'by') $error();
00540                 if(empty($methodParts)) $error();
00541                 
00542                 $field = implode('_', $methodParts);
00543                 if(!in_array($field, static::getFields())) $error();
00544                 $options['conditions'] = array($field => $args[0]);
00545                 if(!isset($args[1]) or !is_array($args[1])) $args[1] = array();
00546                 if(isset($args[1]['conditions'])) $options['conditions'] = array_merge($args[1]['conditions'], $options['conditions']);
00547                 return static::find(array_merge($args[1], $options));
00548                 
00549         }
00550         
00575         public static function find($options = array()) {
00576                 
00577                 static::__init();
00578                 
00579                 // Fill any unset options with defaults.
00580                 $defaults = array(
00581                         'conditions' => array(),
00582                         'fields' => '*',
00583                         'type' => 'all',
00584                         'orderBy' => '',
00585                         'limit' => 0,
00586                         'operator' => 'and',
00587                         'cascade' => true,
00588                         'processed' => array(static::getName())
00589                 );
00590                 $options = array_merge($defaults, $options);
00591                 
00592                 // Get the SQL query.
00593                 $query = static::buildSQL($options);
00594                 
00595                 // Execute query and store result.
00596                 Database::query($query);
00597                 $class = static::getName();
00598                 if($options['type'] == 'first') {
00599                         $return = Database::getRow('array');
00600                         if($return) $return = new $class($return);
00601                         else $return = null;
00602                 }else {
00603                         $return = Database::getAll('array');
00604                         if(!empty($return)) $return = array_map(function($row) use($class) {return new $class($row);}, $return);
00605                 }
00606                 
00607                 // Relate the result if in the options.
00608                 if($return and $options['cascade']) static::findRelated($return, $options['processed']);
00609                 
00610                 // Return it.
00611                 return $return;
00612                 
00613         }
00614         
00622         protected static function buildSQL($options) {
00623                 
00624                 foreach($options['conditions'] as $key => $value) {
00625                         if(is_string($key)) {
00626                                 // Parse the value for operators.
00627                                 if(!is_string($value)) $value = strval($value);
00628                                 if(in_array($operator = substr($value, 0, 3), array('<> ', 'in ', '!= ', '<= ', '>= '))) {
00629                                         $operator = trim($operator);
00630                                         if($operator == '!=') $operator = '<>';
00631                                         if($operator == 'in') $value = "('" . implode("', '", explode(',', Database::escape(substr($value, 3)))) . "')";
00632                                         else $value = "'" . Database::escape(substr($value, 3)) . "'";
00633                                 }elseif(in_array($operator = substr($value, 0, 2), array('< ', '> ', '~ ', '= '))) {
00634                                         $operator = trim($operator);
00635                                         if($operator == '~') $operator = 'like';
00636                                         $value = "'" . Database::escape(substr($value, 2)) . "'";
00637                                 }else {
00638                                         $operator = '=';
00639                                         $value = "'" . Database::escape($value) . "'";
00640                                 }
00641                                 $options['conditions'][] = "`" . static::p()->name . "`.`$key` $operator $value";
00642                                 unset($options['conditions'][$key]);
00643                         }
00644                 }
00645                 
00646                 // Sort out the 'fields' options.
00647                 if(is_array($options['fields'])) $options['fields'] = "`" . static::p()->name . "`.`" . implode("`,`" . static::p()->name . "`.`", $options['fields']) . '`';
00648                 
00649                 // Start building the query.
00650                 $query = 'select ' . $options['fields'] . ' from `' . static::getTableName() . "` as `" . static::p()->name . "` where " . (implode(' ' . $options['operator'] . ' ', $options['conditions']) ?: '1');
00651                 
00652                 // Append the other options.
00653                 if($options['orderBy']) {
00654                         @list($field, $dir) = explode(' ', $options['orderBy']);
00655                         if($dir != 'asc' and $dir != 'desc') $dir = 'asc';
00656                         $query .= " order by `" . static::p()->name . "`.`$field` $dir";
00657                 }
00658                 if($options['limit']) $query .= ' limit ' . $options['limit'];
00659                 
00660                 return $query;
00661                 
00662         }
00663         
00675         protected static function findRelated(&$result, $processed) {
00676                 
00677                 if(empty($result) or (empty(static::p()->hasOne) and empty(static::p()->hasMany) and empty(static::p()->belongsTo))) return;
00678                 if(is_array($result) and isset($result[0])) foreach($result as &$_result) static::findRelated($_result, $processed);
00679                 elseif(is_object($result)) {
00680                         foreach(array('hasOne' => static::p()->hasOne, 'hasMany' => static::p()->hasMany, 'belongsTo' => static::p()->belongsTo) as $relationType => $relations) {
00681                                 foreach($relations as $alias => $relation) {
00682                                         // Prevent infinite looping, don't relate this model if it's already been related in this cascading find operation.
00683                                         if(in_array($relation['model'], $processed)) continue;
00684                                         
00685                                         $processed[] = $relation['model'];
00686                                         $relation['options']['processed'] = $processed;
00687                                         
00688                                         if(!isset($relation['options']['conditions'])) $relation['options']['conditions'] = array();
00689                                         if($relationType == 'belongsTo') $relation['options']['conditions'][$relation['model']::getPrimaryKey()] = $result->{$relation['foreignKey']};
00690                                         else $relation['options']['conditions'][$relation['foreignKey']] = $result->{static::getPrimaryKey()};
00691                                         
00692                                         if($relationType == 'hasMany') $alias = Inflector::pluralize($alias);
00693                                         
00694                                         $result->$alias = $relation['model']::find($relation['options']);
00695                                 }
00696                         }
00697                 }else throw new BadArgumentException('Model::findRelated() expects parameter 1 to be object or array, \'' . gettype($result) . '\' given.');
00698                 
00699         }

00708         public function insert() {
00709                 
00710                 $fields = array();
00711                 $values = array();
00712                 foreach($this->fields as $field => $value) {
00713                         if(!in_array($field, static::getFields()) or $this->fields[$field] === null) continue;
00714                         $fields[] = "`$field`";
00715                         $values[] = "'" . Database::escape($value) . "'";
00716                 }
00717                 
00718                 $query = 'insert into `' . static::getTableName() . "` (" . implode(', ', $fields) . ') values (' . implode(', ', $values) . ')';
00719                 if(Database::query($query)) {
00720                         if(Database::getInsertId()) $this->primary_key = Database::getInsertId();
00721                         static::p()->table->updateRowCount();
00722                         return true;
00723                 }else return false;
00724                 
00725         }
00726         
00736         public function update() {
00737                 
00738                 if(!isset($this->primary_key)) throw new BadArgumentException("Model::update() requires the supplied data to include the primary key of the item to update.");
00739                 
00740                 $primaryKey = $this->primary_key;
00741                 $updates = array();
00742                 foreach($this->fields as $field => $value) {
00743                         if($field == static::getPrimaryKey()) continue;
00744                         $updates[] = "`$field` = '" . Database::escape($value) . "'";
00745                 }
00746                 
00747                 $query = 'update `' . static::getTableName() . '` set ' . implode(', ', $updates) . ' where `' . static::getPrimaryKey() . "` = '$primaryKey' limit 1";
00748                 if(Database::query($query)) {
00749                         static::p()->table->updateRowCount();
00750                         return true;
00751                 }else return false;
00752                 
00753         }
00754         
00769         public function save($options = array()) {
00770                 
00771                 if(!is_array($options)) throw new BadArgumentException("Model::save() expected parameter 1 to be an array, '" . gettype($options) . "' given.");
00772                 if(!isset($options['cascade'])) $options['cascade'] = false;
00773                 if(!isset($options['validate'])) $options['validate'] = true;
00774                 $return = array();
00775                 
00776                 $this->runHook('beforeSave');
00777                 
00778                 if($options['cascade']) {
00779                         foreach(static::p()->belongsTo as $alias => $relation) {
00780                                 if(!isset($this->$alias)) continue;
00781                                 $return[] = $this->$alias->save($options);
00782                                 $this->{$relation['foreignKey']} = $this->$alias->primary_key;
00783                         }
00784                 }
00785                 
00786                 $idFunction = 'findFirstBy' . Inflector::camelize(static::getPrimaryKey());
00787                 if(!isset($this->primary_key)) $function = 'insert';
00788                 elseif(!static::$idFunction($this->primary_key)) $function = 'insert';
00789                 else $function = 'update';
00790                 
00791                 if($options['validate']) if($this->validate() !== true) return false;
00792                 $return[] = $this->$function();
00793                 
00794                 if($options['cascade']) {
00795                         foreach(static::p()->hasMany as $alias => $relation) {
00796                                 $alias = Inflector::pluralize($alias);
00797                                 if(!isset($this->$alias)) continue;
00798                                 foreach($this->$alias as &$data) {
00799                                         $data->{$relation['foreignKey']} = $this->primary_key;
00800                                         $return[] = $data->save($options);
00801                                 }
00802                         }
00803                         foreach(static::p()->hasOne as $alias => $relation) {
00804                                 if(!isset($this->$alias)) continue;
00805                                 $this->$alias->{$relation['foreignKey']} = $this->primary_key;
00806                                 $return[] = $this->$alias->save($options);
00807                         }
00808                 }
00809                 
00810                 $this->runHook('afterSave');
00811                 
00812                 return array_reduce($return, function($a,$b){return $a and $b;}, true);
00813                 
00814         }
00815         
00823         public function delete() {
00824                 
00825                 if(!isset($this->primary_key)) throw new BadArgumentException("Model::delete() requires the supplied data to include the primary key of the item to update.");
00826                 $query = 'delete from `' . static::getTableName() .'` where `' . static::getPrimaryKey() . "` = '$this->primary_key' limit 1";
00827                 if(Database::query($query)) {
00828                         static::p()->table->updateRowCount();
00829                         return true;
00830                 }else return false;
00831                 
00832         }
00833         
00844         public function validate($ignore = array()) {
00845                 
00846                 if(!is_array($ignore)) throw new BadArgumentException("Model::validate() expects parameter 1 to be an array, '" . gettype($ignore) . "' given.");
00847                 
00848                 if(empty(static::p()->validate)) return true;
00849                 
00850                 $errors = array();
00851                 foreach(static::p()->validate as $field => $rules) {
00852                         foreach($rules as $rule => $args) {
00853                                 if(is_int($rule)) $rule = $args;
00854                                 
00855                                 if(isset($ignore[$field]) and is_array($ignore[$field]) and in_array($rule, $ignore[$field])) continue;
00856                                 if(isset($ignore['all']) and is_array($ignore['all']) and in_array($rule, $ignore['all'])) continue;
00857                                 
00858                                 if(!isset($this->$field)) {
00859                                         if($rule == 'required') $errors[$field][$rule] = $rule;
00860                                         continue;
00861                                 }else $value = $this->$field;
00862                                 
00863                                 switch($rule) {
00864                                         case 'minlength':
00865                                                 $pass = (strlen(strval($value)) >= $args);
00866                                                 break;
00867                                         case 'maxlength':
00868                                                 $pass = (strlen(strval($value)) <= $args);
00869                                                 break;
00870                                         case 'length':
00871                                                 $pass = (strlen(strval($value)) == $args);
00872                                                 break;
00873                                         case 'numeric':
00874                                                 $pass = is_numeric($value);
00875                                                 break;
00876                                         case 'unique':
00877                                                 $function = 'findFirstBy' . Inflector::camelize($field);
00878                                                 $pass = !(bool)static::$function($value);
00879                                                 break;
00880                                         case 'date':
00881                                                 $pass = !is_bool(strtotime(strval($value)));
00882                                                 break;
00883                                         case 'dateformat':
00884                                                 $pass = (date($args, strtotime(strval($value))) == $value);
00885                                                 break;
00886                                         case 'regex':
00887                                                 $pass = (bool)preg_match($args, strval($value));
00888                                                 break;
00889                                         case 'callback':
00890                                                 if(is_array($args) and isset($args[0]) and is_callable($args[0])) {
00891                                                         $_args = $args;
00892                                                         $callback = array_shift($_args);
00893                                                 }elseif(is_callable($args)) {
00894                                                         $callback = $args;
00895                                                         $_args = array();
00896                                                 }else throw new BadConfigurationException("Invalid callback defined in model " . static::getName());
00897                                                 $pass = (bool)call_user_func_array($callback, array($value) + $_args);
00898                                                 break;
00899                                         case 'required':
00900                                                 $pass = !empty($value);
00901                                                 break;
00902                                         default:
00903                                                 throw new BadConfigurationException("Invalid validation rule '$rule' defined in model " . static::getName());
00904                                                 break;
00905                                 }
00906                                 if(!$pass) $errors[$field][$rule] = $args;
00907                         }
00908                 }
00909                 
00910                 $this->errors = $errors;
00911                 return empty($errors);
00912                 
00913         }
00914

00933 class InvalidFieldException extends MVCException {
00934         
00942         public function __construct($field, $model) {
00943                 
00944                 $this->message = "Attempted to access invalid field '$field' for model '$model'.";
00945                 
00946         }
